abstract: Defense Department confirms deaths of seven American service members who died supporting operation to eliminate Islamic State militants.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified seven American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
snippet: The Department of Defense has identified seven American service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
